review_text: Gin's Guest House in Deridder is one of the best homes we've ever experienced through Airbnb. She's provided a reasonably priced house that is immaculate, attractive, and very well-appointed. The house has been stocked with numerous thoughtful touches, some practical and some purely aesthetic, and all very much appreciated. The wi-fi worked very well. I didn't test it, but we obviously had a very fast connection. I'm always looking for houses with a recliner because I sleep better on one. Gin's Guest House has four in the living room! I was thrilled. Yes, I only used one, but the other three looked just as comfortable. I slept very well, by the way. The spouse said her bed was wonderful as well. The house is in a nice quiet neighborhood within five or ten (usually just five for us) minutes or so to just about any place you'd care to drive to in Deridder. Do note, as some other reviews have pointed out, that there isn't a TV in the house. If you have to have one, this isn't your Airbnb solution. Spouse and I don't go on trips to watch TV so we didn't expect or miss one. We did, for the first time ever in an Airbnb home, play some rousing games of Sorry, using one of the games in the sun room. I loved the desk setup in the sun room for my laptop. I could go on and on. This is just a really nice house that provided all we could reasonably want in an Airbnb. If we get back over to Deridder, we'll definitely be wanting to stay here again.
